website_summaries.verdict: Three machines in one. Multi-tier discs allow you to use this dispenser with three different sizes of strapping.
pros: Intended for use with both poly and steel strapping
Multi-tier discs let you use three core sizes
Features storage tray for clips, seals, and other tools
Made of durable steel with powder-coated finish
cons: Strap pinch rollers and guide wheel may be problematic

customer_reviews.title: Your next straping holder!
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far! I looked around trying to justify some of the prices of the steel cart produced domestically. While the build quality of this cart might suffer slightly, it is well made and very vibrant looking out of the box. After initial use(1 month) This product has maintained its appearance and usability. i like the rubber brake option and it keeps steel from unspooling like previous models i have used. I only ranked it four stars because the little metal piece that the strapping guides on, keeps coming out of its slot. Not a huge deal, doesnt affect usability. If you have Amazon Prime, this is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Sherah Justus

customer_reviews.title: Works and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered and the box was beat up. The exposed metal parts were rusted (wheel area). Went together easily and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Haidinyak

customer_reviews.title: Great price and so so quality
customer_reviews.text: Great price and so so quality. The guide wheel on the rim is pretty much useless. The strap always slip to the side. The two yellow disk does not clamp spool flat enough so strap also fall in to the gap between spool and yellow disk.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Could been better
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was horrible. Unit came damaged. No packing materials were used and the unit was all bent. Expensive for what it is and the semi light construction.
customer_reviews.author: christian

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This makes it so much easier to handle that banding by hand, this is our first cart, so I don't know what to compare it to, but seems like good construction and a good price compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Travis M. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Banding cart
customer_reviews.text: A good product for Trekker Forms. Needless to say banding ,metal forms to ensure you don't drop them on the highway and stock them for later is very important
customer_reviews.author: owen bristow

customer_reviews.title: Well Built
customer_reviews.text: Good quality well built item. Evertime i buy an item like this the wheels fall apart. These are very heavy duty and look like they will last for years. The bin on top is big enough to fit all our strapping tools and clamps. Very happy with this purchase. Jack - Las Vegas NV
customer_reviews.author: Jack christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Strap Guide broke within 2 days so I ripped off ...
customer_reviews.text: Strap Guide broke within 2 days so I ripped off the remaining piece and its functional. Buy elseware this stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Hill

customer_reviews.title: Verstil cart
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the money. Met all expectations expected. Could not find a better cart for the money. Will shop again at this store
customer_reviews.author: TLZAGST

customer_reviews.title: bander
customer_reviews.text: I almost ordered 2 by the how it looked in the ad.glad I didn't.the poor quality of the product makes using it frustrating.would not recommend it.spend a little more and get one that works.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

product_meta.title: Vestil STRAP-PS-HD Steel Strapping Cart with Powder Coat Finish, 24-7/8" Width, 43" Height, 20-1/2" Depth
product_meta.description: This universal strapping cart is designed for use with both poly and steel strapping. Now you only need one cart for both types of strapping. Unique multi-tier discs allow for use with strapping core sizes of 16" x 3", 16" x 6" and 8" x 8". Cart includes storage tray for holding clips, seals and tools. Heavy-duty wheels for portability. Steel construction with powder coat finish.
feature_bullets: Designed for both poly and steel strapping
Multi-tier discs allows for use of three strapping core sizes
Includes storage tray for holding clips, seals, and tools
